comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Should probably be "Allen". Allen Stoneham was an Englishman who, with his friend John Whitley, was responsible for the development of Le Touquet as a fashionable resort. His house in Etaples, near Le Touquet, was built in 1911. It is now a hotel with several golf courses. See notes for

comment.author: 34997905@N03
comment._content: Thanks. Will investigate whether "Allen" or "Allan" and update the catalog record over time.
